content: this is a summary of a legal case in the taurage district court the applicant is seeking ownership of a car an audi a4 without having to compensate the defendant the applicant claims to have paid for the car using their own funds while the defendant contributed to maintenance and repair costs the defendant agrees with the applicants claims and the court awards the car to the applicant without compensation to the defendant in another legal case the plaintiff is seeking a divorce and division of property from the defendant the plaintiff believes the marriage should be dissolved due to fault on the part of the defendant and requests ownership of a car the court will determine the division of assets and liabilities based on the materials provided the court concludes that the car is community property and should be included in the division of assets but the plaintiff requests ownership without compensation the court upholds the plaintiffs claim and awards them ownership of the car the court also addresses pending cases regarding the parties debts and allocates the costs of the court proceedings accordingly the defendant is ordered to pay the costs of serving procedural documents the court grants permission for a complete dissolution of the marriage in a separate case the defendant is ordered to pay costs for stateguaranteed legal aid stamp duty and the state costs of serving procedural documents

metadata.cost: 175.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 266.67 EUR (proffesional fees) + 19.92 EUR (court fees)
